prompt_details.task_description: Perform layout analysis and content extraction from the provided document image. Identify structural elements in the order they appear on the page. Extract legal clauses with a focus on Definitions and Interpretations, Obligations/Requirements, and Judgment Dates. Preserve styling using Markdown (**bold**, *italic*, __underline__). Each clause should be tagged with its relevant category where possible. **Important: Your response must consist exclusively of the JSON object as defined in 'output_format_instructions'. Do not repeat or include any part of this prompt, nor any other text, in the response.**

output_format_instructions.schema_description: Return a JSON object with a single key 'document_elements', an array of structural elements extracted from the document.

fields.name: correlation-id
fields.description: Unique ID for the element (e.g., '1', '1.1'). Use nested IDs for hierarchical items.

fields.name: tag
fields.description: One of the following: 'Title', 'Subtitle', 'Heading', 'Paragraph', 'List', 'Clause', 'Table of Contents', 'Table', 'Figure', 'Glossary', 'Enum', 'Page number', 'Footer', 'Footnote', 'Endnotes', 'Header'.

fields.name: content
fields.description: Main text content. Use Markdown for styling. For 'Table of Contents', return a JSON string of items. For 'Table', return Markdown table or array of arrays.

fields.name: clause-type
fields.description: If the element is a clause, classify it as one of: 'Definition/Interpretation', 'Obligation/Requirement', 'Judgment Date', or leave null.

fields.name: act-name-citations
fields.description: Referenced laws, cited legislation, or case law (semicolon-separated).

fields.name: issuance-date
fields.description: Issuance date in YYYY-MM-DD if found.

fields.name: compliance-date
fields.description: Compliance date in YYYY-MM-DD if found.

fields.name: effective-date
fields.description: Effective date in YYYY-MM-DD if found.

fields.name: publication-date
fields.description: Publication date in YYYY-MM-DD if found.

fields.name: judgment-date
fields.description: Judgment date in YYYY-MM-DD if mentioned (used for case law or court orders).

fields.name: legislative-body
fields.description: Name of the legislative body or issuing authority.

prompt_details.input_image_description: This is an image of a legal document page in base64 JPEG format.

document_image: Base64-encoded JPEG image of the document page
